direction: Directions to SolveChoose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.
question: In the series 2, 6, 18, 54, ...... what will be the 8th term ?
answer_description: Clearly, 2 x 3 = 6, 6 x 3 = 18, 18 x 3 = 54,.....So, the series is a G.P. in which a = 2, r = 3.Therefore 8th term = ar8-1= ar7= 2 x 37= (2 x 2187) = 4374.
